attributes.action: stafford hospital A&E dept should be refinanced and reopened as soon as possible
attributes.additional_details:
Stafford a&e was closed because patients lives were being put at risk.  Since the night closure of a&e patients lives have been put further at risk.

-if the staff are not suitable or available, then do something about it.
-if more money is required to bring it up to the correct level, spend it.

There is no excuse not to have it reopened.

Stafford hospital has been at the front of news headlines for a while.  The coalition has been in power for just as long.  Shouldn't this be a priority?.  Isn't the health of the nation a priority?

Please debate why it has been allowed to go this far, why Stafford hospital hasn't been used as a poster child for success in the NHS and for all MPs who care about the people.    Please REOPEN Stafford hospital A&E

Kind Regards

Jas harrar
